name: Kamil the Cat's Unbelievable Party
description:
Are you sure? Are you sure it's today? Wait, you're right, it IS today! It's Kamil the Cat's birthday! Gosh, we have to make a cake! And pump up the balloons! And... wait, stop reading, this text is kinda spoiling you the game, isn't it?

The game is really short... like 2 minutes actually. We've always had a problem with creating long games. But that's gonna change with our newest project which you can keep track of at BlackCo.de!
